Do you get an SMS OTP ? Enter it below & get start now.
GOLD:\n$300 JM (Junomoneta Rewards $) will earn you equity or in APP purchases of dinner/lunch for 2, after 3 months of engaged use of APP.

PREMIUM:\n$600 JM (Junomoneta Rewards $) will earn you equity or Free Economic class air ticket to Miami for USA residents and for Indian residents 1 economic class air ticket or ticket on Angriya – India’s first cruise ship to Goa. Must be engaged viewer for 8 months.

LUXURY:
1) $1500 JM = one 50" color TV anywhere in world.
2) Or 2 tickets Angriya, India’s first luxury cruise ship Tickets economy class to Goa from Mumbai and 1 night stay in Hotel in Goa for residents in India.
3) Or 2 cruise tickets from Miami to Bahams for US residents. $1500 JM = 1 Mediterranean cruise tickets For Romania /European residents. Must be engaged viewer for 1 year or 1 economy Air ticket from Bucharest to Milan /uk.
